meanings.definition: Unfashionable, socially awkward, or intellectually inclined
meanings.sent1: She felt nerdy wearing her glasses to the party.
meanings.sent2: The nerdy student spent hours in the library studying.
meanings.sent3: His nerdy outfit made everyone laugh at the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The nerdy bookworm dove into the world of fantasy novels.
meanings.sent5: The nerdy scientist was lost in thought, pondering complex equations.

meanings.definition: A person who is extremely interested in a particular subject, especially one related to technology or science.
meanings.sent1: The nerdy was always tinkering with gadgets in his workshop.
meanings.sent2: She found a group of fellow nerdy to discuss the latest tech trends.
meanings.sent3: The nerdy won the science fair with his innovative project.
meanings.sent4: The nerdy was a star at the robotics competition.
meanings.sent5: In the lab, the nerdy was like a wizard casting scientific spells.
